description: Beautiful bisexual bitch Maxxi learns the hard way at the hands of the sadistic Ashton Bradley, who loves nothing more than the sound of tough boy's cries for mercy. Waxed and wanked, there is not a minute that passes when Maxxi doesn't know whether to whimper in pain or moan in pleasure. For Ashton it's all pleasure!
title: Ashton Bradley & Maxxi Gerard
